label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":51,"text":"腹腔内积蓄大量浆液性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"浆液性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉鸡腹水症是由于多种非特异性的致病因素引起的、3～4周龄左右肉鸡的一种疾病，以腹腔内积蓄大量浆液性液体为特征。

label: [{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"肉仔鸡常发病症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":85,"end":88,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 1.发生情况肉鸡腹水症是肉仔鸡常发病症，其发病原因多种多样，如生长发育快、饲料变化、中毒、缺氧、低温、高温，细菌和病毒的侵入等，但最根本的原因是饲料中粗蛋白质含量过高造成消化道机能紊乱。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"呼吸道黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":74,"text":"呼吸器官炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":76,"end":81,"text":"渗出物增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":92,"end":94,"text":"缺氧","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"呼吸器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 由于消化道机能紊乱，使肠道中的尿素酶活性增强，水解肠道中的蛋白质物质产生氨，造成自家中毒，造成氧供应不足，氧缺乏使呼吸道黏膜受刺激，引起呼吸器官炎症，使渗出物增多，出现呼吸困难，又造成缺氧。

label: [{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":77,"end":82,"text":"刺激呼吸道","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":79,"end":82,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 多发生在冬季或早春、晚秋天气寒冷季节，多因群养、密度大，为了保温而舍内空气不流畅，空气污浊，粪便发酵产生硫化氢、氨及呼出的二氧化碳等有害气体不能及时排出，刺激呼吸道而至呼吸困难。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"内分泌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"神经","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"心肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":155,"end":158,"text":"腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":80,"end":84,"text":"心脏扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":84,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":85,"end":89,"text":"收缩无力","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":92,"end":94,"text":"缺氧","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":95,"end":103,"text":"红细胞变形性降低","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":98,"end":103,"text":"变形性降低","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":106,"end":113,"text":"静脉血回流障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":119,"end":126,"text":"门静脉回流障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":122,"end":126,"text":"回流障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":127,"end":131,"text":"血液瘀滞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":129,"end":131,"text":"瘀滞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":132,"end":138,"text":"液体成分渗出","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":142,"end":147,"text":"积聚于腹腔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":149,"end":153,"text":"腹腔积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":151,"end":153,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":82,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":95,"end":98,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":106,"end":109,"text":"静脉血","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":109,"end":113,"text":"回流障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":115,"end":118,"text":"肝静脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":119,"end":122,"text":"门静脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":127,"end":129,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":145,"end":147,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":149,"end":151,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 3～4周龄左右的肉鸡生长发育较快，需氧量增加显著,这时期如新鲜空气供应不足，本身内分泌与神经调节功能不健全，心肺功能不成熟，在增加心跳次数、肺压升高的情况下，使心脏扩张，收缩无力，由于缺氧，红细胞变形性降低，造成静脉血回流障碍，使肝静脉及门静脉回流障碍，血液瘀滞，液体成分渗出及溢出，积聚于腹腔造成腹腔积水，即腹水症。

label: [{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":84,"end":89,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 再加上其他应激因素如预防注射、惊扰，饲料变化，饲料中有霉败变质的成分，饲料中缺乏维生素，矿物质不足，粗蛋白质含量过高，高脂肪饲料过多，食盐含量高，饮水量增加等，均可促进肉鸡腹水症的发生。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"精神不佳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":25,"text":"羽毛蓬松无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"蓬松无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"两翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"粪便稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"冠髯发绀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"发绀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"日渐消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"两翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"冠髯","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 2.临床症状病鸡食欲不振，精神不佳，羽毛蓬松无光泽，两翅下垂，粪便稀薄，多以白色为主，冠髯发绀或苍白，日渐消瘦。

label: [{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"腹部膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"青紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"触之柔软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"有波动感","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"行动不便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"动作迟缓","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"蹲卧不动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"嗜睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"躺卧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":61,"text":"似企鹅行走姿势","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"黏膜发绀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"发绀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":73,"end":77,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":78,"end":82,"text":"肛门外翻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":82,"text":"外翻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":94,"end":99,"text":"抽搐而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"重症患鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":78,"end":80,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 最明显的特征为腹部膨大、青紫色，触之柔软有波动感，病鸡行动不便，动作迟缓，有时蹲卧不动，嗜睡和躺卧，人为驱动似企鹅行走姿势，重症患鸡可见黏膜发绀，呼吸困难，肛门外翻，如这时再有惊扰，则容易抽搐而死亡。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"胸腹皮下胶样水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"胶样水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"肌肉萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"深红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"腹部胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":76,"text":"腹水溢出","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"呈胶冻状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"肺脏瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":86,"end":88,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":89,"end":91,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"胸腹皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"腹壁肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":84,"end":86,"text":"肺脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 3.病理变化剖开皮肤后，可见胸腹皮下胶样水肿，肌肉萎缩、瘀血，呈深红色，腹部胀大，切开薄薄的腹壁肌肉后，则见有大量的黄白色或稍带白色的清澈透明的腹水溢出，有的呈胶冻状；肺脏瘀血、水肿；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"心包积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":11,"text":"心脏增大变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"增大变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"右心室扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"心肌松弛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"松弛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"充满血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"右心室","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心包积液，心脏增大变形，右心室扩张，心肌松弛，充满血液；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"胆囊胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"充满胆汁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":22,"text":"纤维素性包膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"膜下有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"变软质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"肾脏充血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"充血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":50,"text":"尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"膜下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 胆囊胀大充满胆汁：肝脏肿大，有纤维素性包膜炎，膜下有出血点，变软质脆；肾脏充血肿大，有的有尿酸盐沉积；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":24,"text":"腺胃黏膜有一层白色糊状物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"糊状物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"卡他性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"腺胃黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脾脏肿大，有的有出血点：腺胃黏膜有一层白色糊状物；小肠常见卡他性炎症。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":8,"end":17,"text":"供应充足的新鲜空气","labels":["control"]}]
text: 1.加强饲养管理供应充足的新鲜空气，减少或避免不良因素的刺激。

label: [{"start":2,"end":10,"text":"改善饲养管理制度","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"实施限制喂饲","labels":["control"]}]
text: 2.改善饲养管理制度实施限制喂饲，从13日龄开始，每天减少10%饲料量，维持2周，然后恢复正常饲养。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"合理调制饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"保证维生素C","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":41,"text":"以粉料代替颗粒料","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 3.合理调制饲料保证维生素C和微量元素硒以及矿物质钙、磷的摄人量，以粉料代替颗粒料。

label: [{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"限制饮水量","labels":["control"]},{"start":0,"end":13,"text":"饲料中粗蛋白质的含量要合理","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"高脂肪饲料要控制","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":31,"text":"食盐的含量要平衡","labels":["control"]}]
text: 饲料中粗蛋白质的含量要合理，高脂肪饲料要控制，食盐的含量要平衡，限制饮水量。

label: [{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"及早发现","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"全群防范","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"改善环境条件","labels":["control"]}]
text: 4.治疗方法肉鸡腹水症无特异治疗方法，应及早发现，全群防范，改善环境条件，增强机体健康和抗病能力，达到不发病、少发病、少损失的目的。

label: [{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"脲酶抑制剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":18,"text":"饲料中添加脲酶抑制剂","labels":["control"]}]
text: 必要时，可在每吨饲料中添加脲酶抑制剂进行治疗，即维生素C500克/吨料，可收到理想效果。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"幼龄肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":30,"text":"腹腔中积聚大量浆液性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"浆液性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉鸡腹水症是多种因素引起的以幼龄肉鸡腹腔中积聚大量浆液性液体为特征的疾病。

label: [{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"腹腔积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"右心肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"肉鸡腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"高海拔病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"右心","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要发生于4周龄以上的肉鸡，雄性比雌性发病严重，特点是腹腔积水并伴有右心肥大。肉鸡腹水症在高海拔地区较常发生，曾称“高海拔病”。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"产生腹水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"肺部缺氧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"肺部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 高海拔低压缺氧诱发，2~3周产生腹水。鸡舍内通气不良，环境卫生差，产生的氨气、灰尘过多，相对湿度过大及其他有害气体和消毒用福尔马林等刺激导致肺部缺氧而发生。

label: [{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"肺毛细血管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":72,"end":75,"text":"右心房","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":88,"end":91,"text":"肺动脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":96,"end":100,"text":"右心衰竭","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":105,"end":107,"text":"腹水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":98,"end":100,"text":"衰竭","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":96,"end":98,"text":"右心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":88,"end":93,"text":"肺动脉高压","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":72,"end":82,"text":"右心房代偿性功能增强","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 采用高蛋白、高脂肪等高耗氧饲料，而且不加限饲，尤其在低温条件下，肉鸡生长速度过快，鸡体代谢增强，而肺毛细血管不能满足机体代谢所必需的氧，由此引起右心房代偿性功能增强，造成相应的肺动脉高压，导致右心衰竭。最后形成腹水。

label: [{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"芥子酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"缺氧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"肝硬化","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"硬化","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":49,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 尤以饲喂颗粒饲料者更加明显。饲料中拌有过量的痢特灵和含有芥子酸的菜籽油，影响心肌功能，导致缺氧和肝硬化。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"腹水","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 营养因素如维生素E、微量元素硒等缺乏，以及饲料中高钙低磷。严重病例可导致腹水。继发于其他疾病。

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"气囊感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"功能障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"缺氧","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"腹水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 如大肠杆菌病可造成气囊感染和心包炎发生，导致功能障碍，引起缺氧，最后形成腹水。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"羽毛蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"拉稀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"腹部膨胀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"膨胀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"两腿叉开","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"叉开","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"行为迟钝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":53,"text":"冠和肉垂呈紫红色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"紫红色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"肉垂","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 一般高发于冬季。病鸡表现精神不振，羽毛蓬乱、拉稀、腹部膨胀，两腿叉开，行为迟钝。呼吸困难，冠和肉垂呈紫红色。

label: [{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":13,"text":"全身组织器官瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":24,"text":"全身骨骼肌瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"深红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"肺部充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"心包积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"心脏增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"肝脏充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"边缘变厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":66,"text":"覆有一层半胶冻样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":73,"text":"肾脏充血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":73,"text":"充血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":81,"text":"有尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":88,"text":"肠道广泛充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"广泛充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":89,"end":99,"text":"腹腔中有纤维蛋白凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":93,"end":99,"text":"纤维蛋白凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":100,"end":110,"text":"积液通常清亮呈棕红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":107,"end":110,"text":"棕红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"组织器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"骨骼肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"肺部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":82,"end":84,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":89,"end":91,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检可见鸡全身组织器官瘀血、水肿，全身骨骼肌瘀血、深红色。肺部充血、水肿，心包积液，心脏增大，肝脏充血、边缘变厚、覆有一层半胶冻样物，肾脏充血肿大，并有尿酸盐沉积，肠道广泛充血，腹腔中有纤维蛋白凝块，积液通常清亮呈棕红色。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":9,"text":"口服双氧克尿噻","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":9,"text":"双氧克尿噻","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"毛花丙苷","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"西地兰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]}]
text: 病鸡口服双氧克尿噻，每只50mg，每日2次，连服3天有一定疗效。毛花丙苷(西地兰)按每千克体重0.04~0.08mg的剂量，肌内注射，隔日1次，连用2~3次。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"硫酸钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"水溶液连饮","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"维生素B","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"维丙胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"混合肌内注射","labels":["control"]}]
text: 硫酸钠4%~6%水溶液连饮2~3天，有一定疗效。可用维生素B,10mg,维丙胺5mg混合肌内注射，每日2次，有较好的缓解和治疗功能，能有效控制减轻病情

label: [{"start":1,"end":5,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"氟哌酸粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"拌料","labels":["control"]}]
text: 。卡那霉素按千克体重4000IU溶于饮水中，每日2次。用氟哌酸粉0.1%拌料，连喂5天，可有效控制鸡群发病死亡。

label: [{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"肾肿灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"腹水严重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"穿刺放液","labels":["control"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":87,"end":90,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 用肾肿灵2%饮水5天，隔周1次，可有效降低发病率及死亡率。腹水严重的病鸡可穿刺放液，穿刺部位选择腹部最低点，以便排出积液，一次排放量不宜过大，以防虚脱。为防继续感染可同时使用抗生素。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肉鸡腹水综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":58,"end":64,"text":"改善饲养环境","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"腹水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"并发症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":69,"text":"科学管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"科学配方","labels":["control"]},{"start":80,"end":86,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]}]
text: 肉鸡腹水综合征，一般初期症状不明显，到产生腹水时已是病程后期，并发症导致死亡率增高，治疗困难，故应以预防为主，主要从改善饲养环境、科学管理、科学配方等方面考虑。加强饲养管理。

label: [{"start":0,"end":13,"text":"保证鸡舍内有良好的通风换气","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"过氧乙酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"带鸡喷雾","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":29,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"控制饲喂量","labels":["control"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 保证鸡舍内有良好的通风换气，如用0.3%的过氧乙酸每周带鸡喷雾1～2次，既可除氨，又可给鸡舍增氧。控制饲喂量，减缓肉鸡的早期生长速度。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"合理搭配饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":51,"end":56,"text":"大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":57,"end":63,"text":"慢性呼吸道病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":64,"end":71,"text":"传染性支气管炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 合理搭配饲料，减少粗蛋白含量。每吨饲料中添加维生素C500g、维生素E2万IU,有较好的预防效果。控制大肠杆菌病、慢性呼吸道病和传染性支气管炎等的发生。

label: [{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"腹水症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"煤酚类消毒剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 避免药物中毒，痢特灵、煤酚类消毒剂、变质鱼粉等都会诱发腹水症。
